features.heading: Easy model building
features.paragraph: A Kalman filter fusing barometric and accelerometer data estimates the height and velocity of your sounding rocket. The filter can detect apogee reliably even if two barometers and two imuâ€™s fail.

features.heading: Fully open source hardware and software for easy modifications
features.paragraph: All our hardware designs and software running on our board is fully open source. Documentation and support is also available through our website and our discord server.

features.heading: Powerful experimentation for research and student development
